content.text:
# Silver Condor Award for Best Animated Feature

The Silver Condor Award for Best Animated Feature  (), given by the Argentine Film Critics Association, awards the best animated feature film in Argentina each year. The first award was given in 2001. The award has not been granted since 2008.
